name: That Vegan Teacher Game
description:
This game is very simple to use. 

Moving forward: W

Moving Left: A

Moving Right: D

Moving Backwards: S

Jump: Space

Picking up Animals: Run it to them

Left Shift + W: Sprint

Left Ctrl or ⌃ + W: Slide

Left Ctrl or ⌃: Duck Down

Here is the total amount of animals you can get on each
